name: Illyria
declaringWar: It was a pleasure knowing you, goodbye.
attacked: After I'm done with your men, I'll be sending some young Illyrian boys so their widows don't have to remain lonely.
defeated: My kingdom may have fallen, but the Illyrian people will one day rise again!
introduction: Hello there! I am Teuta, queen of Illyrians, and hopefully your future ally!
tradeRequest: I see mutual benefit in this deal, don't you agree?
uniqueName: Time to incessantly commit piracy and then disappear off the face of the Earth.
uniques: No movement cost to pillage <for [Water] units>
uniqueText: Units are faster in coastal tiles, and coasts yield +1 [Gold]. Receive 1/3 of the cost of enemy water units, and Illyrian naval units pillage for free.
